reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress classy and appreciate its perfect length, with one noting it's loose enough to hide panty lines. They describe it as comfortable, soft, flattering, and warm, with one mentioning it hugs the bump well. The neckline receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's high, and opinions about transparency are divided, with some saying it's not see-through while others find it slightly transparent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, good fit
items.body: I'm 5'1", 140 lbs, small up top, wide hips. Purchased the medium in beige and it fits good. Not too tight and just loose enough to not show panty lines (I do wear shape wear tho). It stops about 2" above my knees. And I paired it with cable knit long socks, knee high boots and a cropped distressed pleather jacket. The material is soft and comfortable. I've worn sweaters like this before and the material will stretch out over time around the collar and sleeve holes. It also pills if you're not careful when you wash it. I wash mine separate and air dry. Read more
items.author: That Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater Dress
items.body: This sweater dress fit perfect. I’m 5’3”+ Just short enough. Just long enough. The quality was excellent. The color was a soft olive. COMFORTABLE. My two girlfriends saw me wearing it and said they had to have one! Since I bought three in different colors, I gifted one to each then bought four more. I bought olive, espresso, brown, black, red! I’m in love with the espresso, black and olive colors. I haven’t looked closely at the other ones. Im excited to have discovered this label!!! Plus they are surprisingly affordable great quality. I’m so excited. Highly recommend!! 5 stars!!!!! Read more
items.author: Irene

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fall Dress
items.body: Beautiful fit, soft fabric but quite a bit of fuzzing after wash stops me from giving 5 stars Read more
items.author: Robin P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and great quality for price
items.body: Very comfy and flattering! This dress is the one I got engaged in! I’d highly recommend pairing with a belt to be a bit more formal fitting, but overall it is a wonderful dress for the price. It is slightly see through, so keep that in mind for what you might wear underneath. Read more
items.author: Alyse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good!
items.body: I love this more than I thought I would!!! As someone who has never worn a sweater dress before, I love this! I am 5’2, curvy with wider hips and a small waist and this fits like a glove! It’s not too short and it’s not too long. It does look shorter in the back bc of my butt but it doesn’t bother me. I bought a brown belt to go with it and it looks great!!! I might order the burgundy color too but we’ll see! I plan on wearing this on thanksgiving and probably Christmas too. Read more
items.author: Hannah Wise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress

items.author: Kimberly Herrera

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Brick Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Coffe, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
